injectors.label: Dramatic Sky
injectors.promptFragment: Create a more dramatic sky with richer, deeper colors and more pronounced gradient transitions.

injectors.label: Subtle Sky
injectors.promptFragment: Create a subtle, understated sky with soft, muted colors - elegant rather than dramatic.

injectors.label: Warm Interior Glow
injectors.promptFragment: Emphasize warm, inviting interior lighting visible through windows with a cozy amber glow.

injectors.label: Bright Interior
injectors.promptFragment: Make interior lighting brighter and more prominent, suggesting a well-lit, welcoming home.

injectors.label: Add Landscape Lighting
injectors.promptFragment: Add subtle landscape lighting - pathway lights, garden uplights, and architectural accent lights where appropriate.

injectors.label: Pool Lighting
injectors.promptFragment: If a pool is visible, add realistic underwater pool lighting with a subtle cyan/turquoise glow.

injectors.label: No Stars
injectors.promptFragment: Do not add any stars to the sky - keep it as a pure twilight gradient.

injectors.label: Early Twilight
injectors.promptFragment: Create an early twilight look with more light in the sky - the sun has just set.

injectors.label: Late Twilight
injectors.promptFragment: Create a late twilight look with a darker sky - approaching night but still with color at the horizon.
